main_business: Apple Computer Sales, Repair, and Parts
description: A one-stop shop for new and refurbished Macs, genuine Apple parts, professional Mac repairs, and device recycling/trade-ins. They are a wholesaler and retailer specializing in Apple products and services.
products_services: New Macs (MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, Mac mini, Mac Studio, Mac Pro)
Certified Refurbished/Open Box Macs and electronics
Genuine Apple parts (logic boards, displays, batteries, power supplies, etc.)
Mac repair services (iMac, Mac Pro, Mac mini, MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Mac Studio)
physical_address: 500 Cirby Way, Suite D, Roseville, CA 95678
summary:
Apple Fix Pros is a comprehensive service provider specializing in Apple products, operating from Roseville, California. The company functions as a one-stop shop, offering sales of new and certified refurbished Macs and related electronics, a vast inventory of over 800 genuine Apple parts for wholesale and retail, and professional repair services performed by Apple and CompTIA A+ certified technicians. They emphasize using 100% genuine parts, offer same-day repairs for many issues, and provide a 1-year warranty on their work. Additionally, they run a buyback/trade-in program for used devices.

The company serves both individual consumers and businesses, including over 7,000 Apple service providers and repair centers across the United States and South America. They highlight their certifications, including R2V3 and multiple ISO standards (9001, 45001, 14001), and boast a strong track record of having helped over 29,000 customers since 2019. Their operations include a physical store for walk-in service and a streamlined process for mail-in repairs and trade-ins.
